name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-azurefunction-northwind2
title: Consume Northwind Microsoft database from Azure using a Function App
shortDescription: This web part consume an anonymous Function App from an HTTP Trigger using the templates from the Northwind Microsoft DBs
longDescription: This web part consume an anonymous Function App from an HTTP Trigger using the templates from the Northwind Microsoft DBs

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
